sentences.en: Fish was unobtainable in certain sections of Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 在东京的某些地方是买不到鱼的。

sentences.en: Fresh fruit was unobtainable in the winter.
sentences.cn: 新鲜水果在冬季是买不到的。

sentences.en: Increases end - call notification volume for unobtainable numbers.
sentences.cn: 增大对无法获得对方号码的通话结束提示音量.

sentences.en: It would take a worldwide crisis to make food unobtainable from any source.
sentences.cn: 只有发生全球性危机,才会到处买不到食品.

sentences.en: Salt is very dear, and sometimes even unobtainable.
sentences.cn: 盐很贵, 有时买不到.

sentences.en: The absolute allocation of these overheads is unobtainable.
sentences.cn: 这些企业管理费用的绝对分配是难以获得的.

sentences.en: Tickets seem unobtainable to the ordinary mortal.
sentences.cn: 普通人好像根本买不到票。

sentences.en: Timber is virtually unobtainable in the islands.
sentences.cn: 在这些岛屿上,实际上无法获得木材.

sentences.en: Unsettling as the resulting events are, they also bring once unobtainable goals within reach.
sentences.cn: 由此引发的事务虽令不安, 但也会使原先无完毕的目的变得触手可及.
